definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to fan/to slap sb on the face
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
gesture/same as 手勢|手势[shou3 shi4]
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
(old) to bow and utter polite phrases/to open the way (for a dignitary etc)
to walk around the stage (to indicate scene changes)
to pull/to draw/to pull back/to withdraw/to flash past
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
